answers.answer: How far along are you and what did the doctor say to you about all the issues your having?
Ill be 32 weeks tomorrow and my dr wouldn't tell me anything

Whaaaaat???  If your doctor finds that sort of crap he is supposed to walk you through it ie things you should be doing differently how to better your symptoms ect!  I think it is definitely complete crap that he didn't talk to you about it!  All your symptoms sound like the start of preeclampsia and I would look up online what to do for your symptoms since your doctor is useless.  Elevate your feet when swollen decrease your salt intake and if he doesn't talk to you about it at least by your next appt you need to find another doc!  Preeclampsia is a serious thing and if your doc doesn't take the safety of you and your baby seriously then you need to find one that will.  I hate doctors!

Its to late for me to change drs I have tried and as far as reading about the preeclampsia I have that's why I'm freaking out when I asked about the swelling they told me I wasn't drinking enough water? I just don't get it they tell me I need to drink 64oz of water a day and I'm drinking more than that but still swelling to the point it hurts to move my fingers and toes my ankles are bigger than softballs I'm just really scared

I would at least sit down with your doctor and really grill him about things you can do!  Its real messed up that he's not taking it seriously especially with the discomfort you are in!  I don't know if your working or anything but I would try my best to keep your legs elevated as much as possible!  I'm only 21 weeks and I've noticed my ankles getting swollen already especially on the days I work 9 hours!  I put them up and it really is much better.  Have they tested you for gestational diabetes?
I'm a stay at home mom we have been having movie time so I can lay down and rest I'm just gonna start going to labor and delivery  when something is bothering me instead of calling my dr
Yes I don't have diabetes they did check my sugar when I was there it was only 128 with me drinking a milkshake
Ok that's good that u don't have it and that is a very good idea if he can't help you emergency certainly will!

It sounds like toxima... I had that with my first.  You should go to another doctor if yours didn't explain what was going on. Toxima is bad for you and the baby. I had to be induced right away. Go see another doctor hun. Its important.

question: I went to the dr today and was told my blood pressure is up and I have protein and sugar in my urine. This has me stressed out because I have been swelling bad and have told the dr about it what else can I do?
title: Please help
